ArgonTest.Name: Box type (class implementing trait)
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Ar._
trait BoxBase(T: type) <: Object public abstract def _.value: T end
class ValueBox(T: type) <: BoxBase T
field value: T
public new(value: T) field value = value end
public override def _.value: T = value end
proc main(): Unit do val box: BoxBase String = ValueBox(String).new 'Hello World' puts box.value end
